name: MCLF Loader
description: Loader for MobiCore Loadable Format (MCLF) trustlet and driver binaries used in Samsung/Mediatek TrustZone implementations
longdescription:
This plugin adds support for loading MobiCore Loadable Format (MCLF) binaries commonly found in Samsung and Mediatek devices' TrustZone implementations.

Features:
- Automatic detection of MCLF files via magic bytes
- Proper mapping of .text, .data, and .bss segments
- Entry point detection with Thumb mode support
- Automatic symbol creation for tlApiLibEntry

Based on the IDA loader by Gassan Idriss.

installinstructions.Darwin: Copy this folder to ~/Library/Application Support/Binary Ninja/plugins/

author: Based on work by Gassan Idriss
